name: UpdateTaskInClickup
description:
Update task details in ClickUp.

Use this tool to update specific fields of a task in ClickUp by providing the task ID and desired changes.

parameters.name: task_identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the task to be updated. Provide either the standard task ID or a custom task ID if 'custom_task_ids' is true.

parameters.name: task_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the fields to update on the task. Includes fields like name, description, priority, due dates, assignees, and more.

custom_item_id.description:
The custom task type ID for this task. A value of `null` (default) sets the task type to type "Task".\
 \
To get a list of available custom task type IDs for your Workspace, use the [Get Custom Task Types endpoint](ref:getcustomitems).

description.description: To clear the task description, include `Description` with `" "`.

markdown_content.description: Markdown formatted description for the task. If both `markdown_content` and `description` are provided, `markdown_content` will be used instead of `description`.

parent.description:
You can move a subtask to another parent task by including `"parent"` with a valid `task id`.\
 \
You cannot convert a subtask to a task by setting `"parent"` to `null`.

value_schema.description: ***Note:** To update Custom Fields on a task, you must use the Set Custom Field endpoint.*

parameters.name: workspace_id_for_custom_task
parameters.description: Provide the Workspace ID when referencing a task by its custom task ID (requires `custom_task_ids` set to true).

value_schema.description:
When the `custom_task_ids` parameter is set to `true`, the Workspace ID must be provided using the `team_id` parameter.
 \
For example: `custom_task_ids=true&team_id=123`.

parameters.name: use_custom_task_ids
parameters.description: Set to true to reference a task by its custom task ID.

value_schema.description: If you want to reference a task by its custom task id, this value must be `true`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the clickup API.

parameters.name: custom_task_ids
parameters.description: If you want to reference a task by its custom task id, this value must be `true`.

value_schema.description: If you want to reference a task by its custom task id, this value must be `true`.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description:
When the `custom_task_ids` parameter is set to `true`, the Workspace ID must be provided using the `team_id` parameter.
 \
For example: `custom_task_ids=true&team_id=123`.

value_schema.description:
When the `custom_task_ids` parameter is set to `true`, the Workspace ID must be provided using the `team_id` parameter.
 \
For example: `custom_task_ids=true&team_id=123`.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: ***Note:** To update Custom Fields on a task, you must use the Set Custom Field endpoint.*

The custom task type ID for this task. A value of `null` (default) sets the task type to type "Task".\
 \

You can move a subtask to another parent task by including `"parent"` with a valid `task id`.\
 \
You cannot convert a subtask to a task by setting `"parent"` to `null`.

value_schema.description: ***Note:** To update Custom Fields on a task, you must use the Set Custom Field endpoint.*

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
